starrrenity 160671299495 "2017-05-14 21:45:53 GMT" https://starrrenity.tumblr.com/post/160671299495/our-connection-is-a-miracle-can-we-talk-about "our-connection-is-a-miracle: Can we talk about how amazing Hernando is for a minute? When Lito is depressed he tries to cheer him up
column2: but quickly realizes that’s not the way to help him. He accepts that he can’t fix Lito’s career troubles
column3: that he can’t just make him feel better with a pep-talk and a positive attitude. He doesn’t tell Lito to cheer up
column5: to get over it. Instead he goes to his room
column6: brings him breakfast and tells him “You don’t need to get up. You don’t need to leave this room. I’m not judging you
column8: or tell you what to do. I just wanted you to know that I love you.    And that you aren’t alone.” And that’s really all Lito needs." False text
